attributes.action: Speaker of The House of Commons must consult with PM before blocking POTUS
attributes.background: I am ashamed of my Country, the United Kingdom, for allowing John Bercow, the Official Speaker of the House of Commons, to block the 45th President of the United States Donald Trump from addressing Parliament during his State Visit, without consultation with the Prime Minister Theresa May MP.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. If you would like the process for deciding on invitations to address both Houses of Parliament in Westminster Hall to be changed, to require the Prime Minister to be consulted, then you could start a new petition asking for that.
